    • CastledBlack

      public boolean CastledBlack
      Is ended up being used as a utility for either team castling, is set to true in order to allow the castle to not be marked as illegal.

  • Method Details

    • ctop

      public static Position ctop​(char x, char y)
      Method created to convert from the user input to a Position instance which we can use for other methods etc.
      Parameters:
      x - input such as a,b,c,e etc which contains the x value of the pieces position
      y - input such as 1,2,3,4 etc which contains the y value of the pieces position
      Returns:
      Position the position of the user inputted string

    • intToChar

      public static char intToChar​(int i)
      Simple method to convert from int to char
      Parameters:
      i - the int i to be converted
      Returns:
      char the char holds the converted int

    • printChessBoard

      public void printChessBoard()
      Utility method to print the board in the format specified in the assignment description

    • getXY

      public Piece getXY​(int x, int y)
      Utility method that takes in an x and y coordinate, and returns the Piece sitting at the coordinate. In this case, x and y refers to the 2 indices of the matrix boardmat declared in this class
      Parameters:
      x - contains the first index of the piece to return
      y - contains the second index of the piece to return
      Returns:
      Piece the Piece that is requested by the user from the x,y coords

    • setXY

      public void setXY​(int x, int y, Piece n)
      Utility method to set the piece at a certain position to the piece speficied by the parameter n x and y here again refer to the 2 indices of matrix holding the pieces, boardmat
      Parameters:
      x - contains the first index of the piece to set
      y - contains the second index of the piece to set
      n - contains the piece meant to be set at the specified x,y location

    • detectblackcheck

      public static boolean detectblackcheck​(Board a)
      Method to detect if black is in check, does so by finding the location of the black king first. Then, if there is any white piece who has a legal move to the kings position, it means the king is in check.
      Parameters:
      a - The board in which to check if there is a black check
      Returns:
      boolean True if the black king is in check, false if not.

    • detectwhitecheck

      public static boolean detectwhitecheck​(Board a)
      Method to detect if white is in check, does so by finding the location of the white king first. Then, if there is any black piece who has a legal move to the kings position, it means the king is in check.
      Parameters:
      a - The board in which to check if there is a white check
      Returns:
      boolean True if the white king is in check, false if not.

    • detectCheckmatewhite

      public static boolean detectCheckmatewhite​(Board a)
      Method to detect if white is in checkmate. Does so by taking each white piece, and simulating every possible legal move. If the simulated move shows that there is no check, it means there is a possible move to be made and so it is not checkmate. If it never finds such a move, it will return true, meaning checkmate.
      Parameters:
      a - The board in which to check if there is a white checkmate
      Returns:
      boolean True if the white king is in checkmate, false if not.

    • detectCheckmateblack

      public static boolean detectCheckmateblack​(Board a)
      Method to detect if black is in checkmate. Does so by taking each black piece, and simulating every possible legal move. If the simulated move shows that there is no check, it means there is a possible move to be made and so it is not checkmate. If it never finds such a move, it will return true, meaning checkmate.
      Parameters:
      a - The board in which to check if there is a black checkmate
      Returns:
      boolean True if the black king is in checkmate, false if not.

    • movePiece

      public void movePiece​(Position start, Position finish)
      Utility method to move a piece from a starting position to a finishing position. This method does not check to make sure the move is legal, and so it is only called after ensuring so.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting position of the piece to be moved
      finish - The ending position that the piece will be moved to

    • simulateMove

      public static String simulateMove​(Position start, Position finish, Board a)
      This method simulates a move from start to finish based on the input parameter board a. It does so by creating a deep copy of the Board, and then running the move, and checking whether or not either team is in check after the move.
      Parameters:
      start - The starting position of the piece to be moved
      finish - The ending position that the piece will be moved to
      a - The board that the move will be simulated on
      Returns:
      String returns the color of the team in check, or "none" if neither are
